1.name: Halloween
1.description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

2.name: Grease
2.description: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

3.name: The Deer Hunter
3.description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

4.name: Superman
4.description: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

5.name: National Lampoon's Animal House
5.description: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

6.name: Day of the Woman
6.description: An aspiring writer is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by four men whom she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.

7.name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
7.description: When seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade a small town, replicating the residents one body at a time.

8.name: Midnight Express
8.description: Billy Hayes (Brad Davis), an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

9.name: Dawn of the Dead
9.description: Following an ever-growing epidemic of zombies that have risen from the dead, two Philadelphia S.W.A.T. team members, a traffic reporter, and his television executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

10.name: Pretty Baby
10.description: A teenage girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.

11.name: Starcrash
11.description: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn.

12.name: Death on the Nile
12.description: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

13.name: Days of Heaven
13.description: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

14.name: Jaws 2
14.description: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

15.name: Goin' South
15.description: Due to the lack of men after the Civil War, a small western town allows a bachelorette with ulterior motives to save a horse thief from the gallows by marrying him. They must deal with his old gang, the Sheriff, the bank, and each other.

16.name: Foul Play
16.description: A shy San Francisco librarian and a bumbling cop fall in love as they solve a crime involving albinos, dwarves, and the Catholic Church.

17.name: Convoy
17.description: Truckers form a mile long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff...Based on the country song of same title by C.W. McCall.

18.name: Up in Smoke
18.description: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

19.name: The Lord of the Rings
19.description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

20.name: Coming Home
20.description: A woman whose husband is fighting in Vietnam falls in love with another man who suffered a paralyzing combat injury there.

21.name: Every Which Way but Loose
21.description: The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe (Clint Eastwood) and his pet orangutan Clyde (Manis the Orangutan).

22.name: The Wiz
22.description: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

23.name: Laserblast
23.description: A teenager stumbles upon an alien weapon, which transforms him into a grotesque killer.

24.name: Watership Down
24.description: A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and protect their new home.

25.name: Heaven Can Wait
25.description: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

26.name: La montagna del dio cannibale
26.description: A girl and her brother fly to New Guinea to look for a lost expedition, led by her husband, which has vanished in the great jungle.

27.name: The Fury
27.description: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from terrorists, who want to use his mental powers for evil.

28.name: Coma
28.description: When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.

29.name: The Boys from Brazil
29.description: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

30.name: Quel maledetto treno blindato
30.description: In 1944 France, a group of escaped American military prisoners en route to Switzerland volunteers to steal a Nazi V2 rocket warhead for the Allies.

31.name: Zui quan
31.description: Wong Fei-Hung (Jackie Chan) is a mischievous, yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents, his frustrated father has him disciplined by Beggar So (Siu Tin Yuen), a Master of drunken martial arts.

32.name: Piranha
32.description: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

33.name: Damien: Omen II
33.description: Damien the Antichrist, now thirteen years old, finally learns of his destiny under the guidance of an unholy disciple of Satan. Meanwhile dark forces begin to eliminate all those who suspect the child's true identity.

34.name: Eyes of Laura Mars
34.description: A famous fashion photographer develops a disturbing ability to see through the eyes of a killer.

35.name: The Wild Geese
35.description: A British banker hires a group of British mercenaries to rescue a deposed African President from the hands of a corrupt African dictator.

36.name: Paradise Alley
36.description: Three Italian-American brothers, living in the slums of 1940's New York City, try to help each other with one's wrestling career using one brother's promotional skills and another brother's con-artist tactics to thwart a sleazy manager.

37.name: Magic
37.description: A ventriloquist is at the mercy of his vicious dummy while he tries to renew a romance with his high school sweetheart.

38.name: Game of Death
38.description: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

39.name: Capricorn One
39.description: A NASA Mars mission won't work, and its funding is endangered, so they decide to fake it just this once. But then they have to keep the secret.

40.name: The First Great Train Robbery
40.description: In Victorian England, a master criminal makes elaborate plans to steal a shipment of gold from a moving train.

41.name: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes!
41.description: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated killer tomatoes.

42.name: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
42.description: Small town band hits it big, but they must battle a nefarious plot in the music industry.

43.name: The Driver
43.description: A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.

44.name: Battlestar Galactica
44.description: After the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Mankind, the last major fighter carrier leads a makeshift fugitive fleet in a desperate search for the legendary planet Earth.

45.name: Felicity
45.description: Young Felicity lives in a monastic school. The only way to live out her sexual fantasies is together with her girlfriend Jenny. But then she receives an invitation to her sister in ...                See full summary »

46.name: F.I.S.T
46.description: A rebellious Cleveland warehouse worker rises through the ranks of a trucking industry union to become union president but his organized crime links cause his eventual downfall.

47.name: Höstsonaten
47.description: A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.

48.name: The Irishman
48.description: The Doolan family are trying to make a go in the freight hauling business in Queensland, Australia. The problem is it's the 1920's, the Doolans use horses and motorized vehicles can do it ...                See full summary »

49.name: Force 10 from Navarone
49.description: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

50.name: The Legacy
50.description: A millionaire, a million-dollar prostitute, a star-maker, a nation-killer, a woman whose lusts are as cold as graveyard snow. Five of the most powerful people in the world, and Maggie (...                See full summary »
